channel.title: [Help] Moparscape server status page
channel.description:
Hello,
So, I had my server on the status 1st page with 1.7k votes, it was showing up as online all the time until today. The uptime went down to 96% and it showed up as offline, but the server actually is online. So I investigated the IP's/ports and all that stuff, it's online. R-L shows that it's online too.
This is the link to it : http://www.moparisthebest.com/serverstatus.php?server=vyrescapepk.no-ip.biz
What should I do?

item.title: [Help] Moparscape server status page
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

My server status checker at http://projectrainbow.net/index.php?type=14 says your server is offline too. By the way, why don’t you post this in “Elite Server Owner Discussion”? That’s honestly the easiest way to directly contact Moparisthebest.

Thanx

Read full topic

item.title: [Help] Moparscape server status page
item.dc:creator: @vyre-scape vyre-scape
item.description:
@vyre-scape wrote:

The Moparian:

Sometimes it takes a bit for your server to receive another packet from the server status, stating the it’s online. As for how it went off in the first place, I’m sure it’s something on your part. Are there other players on your server? If its only you, you might be accessing it through your local host. Your router may have also re assigned local ips to thr computers on your network, or your ISP might have changed your ip external ip.

There are players online all the time. The IP’s haven’t changed. I haven’t changed anything at all. It’s like, not receiving the connection from the server…

Read full topic
